attributes.action: BAN THE SALE OF CHEWING GUM
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is a waste of Tax-Payers money to clean up what is in effect "STICKY LITTER".
A "BAN ON SALES OF CHEWING GUM" would allow "Local Authorities" to spend Tax- Payers money in a more positive direction.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
